title: Browder 'Completely Traumatized' After Being Abused In Jail
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel interviews Jennifer Gonnerman, who wrote about Kalief Browder in The New Yorker. The 22-year-old who was jailed for three years without trial took his own life on Saturday.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
